page.title: 11Redlynch Playground Games
page.content: Short chain tag There are two homes.One person is chaser and tries to touch you.If he does, you are "it" with him. Stuck in the mud One person chases and if he touches you, you have to stand still with your feet apart.Someone has to crawl through your legs to free you.If you are caught three times you are "it". Budge it This is another chasing game but there are lots of"homes" where you are safe from the catcher.If someone is on the "home" you want to go to, you say, "Budge it",and they must go to another home. Sting ball One person throws a ball to try to hit someone.If the person is hit they must join the throwers team.
